messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: I will continue working hard for Exeter, putting our city's interests before the personal or the Party. I'll work to keep my record as the MP with the lowest expenses in the South West. Labour will tackle low pay and cut tax for low and middle earners with a new 10p starting rate. Labour will reduce the deficit in a fairer, more balanced way, protecting our vital public services. Labour will raise an extra £2.5 billion for our NHS from tobacco company profits and a levy on properties worth over £2 million.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will tackle low pay and cut tax for low and middle earners with a new 10p starting rate.
Labour will reduce the deficit in a fairer, more balanced way, protecting our vital public services.
Labour will raise an extra £2.5 billion for our NHS from tobacco company profits and a levy on properties worth over £2 million.

mentions.candidate: It's been a huge privilege to serve you since 1997.

issues.economy: Labour will reduce the deficit in a fairer, more balanced way.
issues.health: Labour will raise an extra £2.5 billion for our NHS from tobacco company profits and a levy on properties worth over £2 million.

leaflet.personalStatement: Exeter has achieved a lot. I hope you will support me so I can continue my work for our city.

politicalExperience.achievements: Exeter's done well in recent years... We've attracted the Met Office, a new Medical School and new businesses. Our schools, College and University have all improved.

images.caption: Ben Bradshaw with a group of children celebrating.
